chart_description: This chart monitors the CPU pressure of a cgroup where all processes share equal access to a certain amount of CPU time.

dimension_descriptions.some 10: This dimension represents the percentage of time in the last 10 seconds that processes in the cgroup were throttled because they exceeded their CPU quota.
dimension_descriptions.some 300: This dimension represents the percentage of time in last 5 minutes that processes in the cgroup were throttled due to exceeding their CPU quota.
dimension_descriptions.some 60: This dimension represents the percentage of time in last minute that processes in the cgroup were throttled due to exceeding their CPU quota.
